name: yech
content:
Add to word list
Add to word list
an expression of strong disapproval and dislike: Yech - that's disgusting! I don't like slimy foods - yecch! Synonym
yuck
More examplesFewer examplesI don't think anyone will like this. Yech.The food was undercooked and revolting - yech!She tried to kiss me. Yech!The first bite is good, and then you're like, yech, disgusting.Most people are disgusted by the thought of cleaning up someone else's dirt. Yech! "Warm milk?"-"Yech."
